tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProductLifecycle ( 
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    production_date DATE, 
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255), 
    lifecycle_stage VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE disposal (
  disposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  disposal_date DATE,
  disposal_location VARCHAR(255),
  disposal_method VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE production (
    product_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR,
    production_date DATE,
    production_location VARCHAR,
    production_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE transportation (
    transport_id INT,
    transport_type VARCHAR,
    transport_date DATE,
    transport_from VARCHAR,
    transport_to VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE storage (
    storage_id INT,
    storage_location VARCHAR,
    storage_capacity INT,
    storage_available_capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE distribution (
    distributor_id INT,
    distributor_name VARCHAR,
    distribution_date DATE,
    distribution_method VARCHAR,
    distribution_location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE disposal (
    disposal_id INT,
    disposal_date DATE,
    disposition_method VARCHAR,
    disposed_quantity INT
)
